30,data,/en/job/technical-lead-global-team-9408674,9408674,Technical Lead - Global Team,False,False,8000,16000,SGD,Cornucopia Pte. Ltd.,21 hours ago,False,,,202121370W,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"

COMPANY PROFILE

Mask Network is a decentralized and autonomous layer on top of existing social media such as Twitter. We aim to connect the billions of Web 2.0 users to the Dapp ecosystems on Web 3.0 by creating a seamless user experience that is secure, fun, privacy-respecting, and fundamentally social.

Mask Network has raised $50 million in the past. Our long-term supporters include Digital Currency Group, Binance, HashKey, and Animoca Brands; with advisors like Liang Xinjun (co-founder and former vice-chairman/CEO of Fosun International), Balaji Srinivasan (former General Partner at a16z and former CTO at Coinbase), Raymond Yuan Wang (co-founder and former CTO of ele.me), and Feng Li (former partner at IDG Capital and investor of Bilibili, Coinbase, Unity).

OUR MISSION

·    We at Mask Network are active promoters in advocating users to value their privacy, personal assets, and have sovereignty above them.

·    We at Mask Network are strong believers in the ownership economy. People should own their creation, their data, and the virtual space they choose to contribute to.

·    We at Mask Network are valiant defenders of the freedom of interpretation. People should take full control in how to interpret the data they received from platforms.

Join us in building the portal to the new, open internet!

","

COMPANY PROFILE

Mask Network is a decentralized and autonomous layer on top of existing social media such as Twitter. We aim to connect the billions of Web 2.0 users to the Dapp ecosystems on Web 3.0 by creating a seamless user experience that is secure, fun, privacy-respecting, and fundamentally social.

Mask Network has raised $50 million in the past. Our long-term supporters include Digital Currency Group, Binance, HashKey, and Animoca Brands; with advisors like Liang Xinjun (co-founder and former vice-chairman/CEO of Fosun International), Balaji Srinivasan (former General Partner at a16z and former CTO at Coinbase), Raymond Yuan Wang (co-founder and former CTO of ele.me), and Feng Li (former partner at IDG Capital and investor of Bilibili, Coinbase, Unity).

You will join a young and creative team that is super driven for crypto mass adoption and has been building for crypto mass adoption since 2018. We are looking for quick learners who have keen interest in the Web3 Metaverse and broad knowledge, while possessing rich experiences in multi-media content creation.

BENEFITS

  • Competitive salary (above industry standards), with annual increases based on performance
  • Ability to work fully remote at home or anywhere with an internet connection – your choice
  • 5-day work week, 10:30am to 6:30pm – yes, that’s one hour lesser than normal work hours
  • Flexible working schedule, we respect your culture and tradition – just notify us before you take your day off!

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Establish a high-quality and high-efficiency technical team according to the business direction and goals set by the company
  • Lead the company's overseas product research and development, formulate overseas product research and development plans, and ensure the quality of delivered products
  • Responsible for communication and coordination between domestic and overseas team

REQUIRED SKILLS

  • Must be bilingual to communicate with Mandarin and English speaking counterparts
  • Embrace the spirit of open source, identify with open source culture, and understands the open source community

  • Have experience in remote team collaboration
  • Proficient in Typescript and at least one front-end framework (React, Vue or Angular)

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • Has open source community management experience
  • Has experience in start-ups or entrepreneurship

Join us in building the portal to the new, open internet!

31,data,/en/job/tender-analyst-asia-pacific-9362866,9362866,"Tender Analyst, Asia Pacific",False,False,,,SGD,JAS WORLDWIDE ASIA PTE LTD,18-Mar-22,False,,,200304671C,,,1 - 50 Employees,,111 Somerset Road,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">JAS, a privately owned freight forwarder and logistics provider company, was founded in Milan, Italy in 1978 under the leadership of Mr. Biagio Bruni.  In the first 10 years, JAS focused on Europe and the Far East, resulting in dominant market share from Italy to Japan.  By the start of the new millennium, JAS has expanded its worldwide footprint globally, opening subsidiaries in India, South America, Northern Europe, Eastern Europe and US.

With more than 30 years in business, JAS is a global leader in air and ocean freight services that has Asia Pacific operations in Australia, China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand and Vietnam.  JAS Worldwide Asia, the regional headquarters of JAS in the Asia Pacific region, was set up in 2003 to provide services to all the subsidiaries in the Asia Pacific region.   JAS Asia Pacific has grown from the strength to strength with the current employee strength of 1300+.
Today, JAS has operations in ninety countries on six continents with more than 4,200 employees worldwide.  Please feel free to visit our website http://www.jas.com for more information.

","

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

• Able to work independently within a team and perform under pressure.

• Detail oriented with strong planning, organizational and analytical skills.

• A go-getter and one that embraces integrity, teamwork and perseverance in your work attitude.

EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

• Between 1 – 3 years direct experience in general freight and/or forwarding.

• Minimum Tertiary education preferably in Logistics or Business.

34,data,/en/job/consultant-analyst-associate-9411039,9411039,Consultant / Analyst / Associate,False,False,,,SGD,EverEdge,42 minutes ago,False,,,201703020D,,,1 - 50 Employees,,,"<div>

column2:
EverEdge is a fast growing intangible asset consulting firm with a dynamic working culture. The working atmosphere is team-centric and supportive. The rewards are significant with the opportunity to be part of a high growth engine in a key area of the new economy: commercializing technology and intangible assets. With offices in three countries, we are experiencing exceptional growth and are looking for an intelligent, energetic, confident and versatile individual who wishes to manage the operations of a fast-growing management consulting practice. Founded in 2008 we have successfully completed over 1,300 client engagements across the United States, Europe, Asia and Australasia.","

EverEdge is a young, dynamic global advisory, valuation and transaction firm specialising in in a key area of the new economy: intangible assets. With offices in four countries and successfully completing more than 2,000 engagements, we are experiencing exceptional growth and are looking for an intelligent, energetic, confident, and versatile individual who wants to fast-track their career.

THE ROLE

Rather than being a small cog in a big wheel, at EverEdge you'll be in front of clients, and you'll see your impact. We are looking for a team player who is self-motivated, entrepreneurial, a lateral thinker, is good under pressure and up to the challenge of working in a fast-growing business and industry. This role combines networking skills with pragmatic commercial and technical expertise to assist the world’s leading companies to grow, and better leverage their intangible assets.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Providing advice to clients in relation to the strategy, risk, value, and commercialisation of their intangible assets.
  • Preparation of reports and presentations for clients or new prospects, including delivery of strategy building workshops with clients.
  • Building relationships with prospective clients and understanding the needs of a client organisation.
  • Developing solutions, preparing and writing reports, and developing on-going client interface opportunities. The ability to develop and maintain client relationships is paramount to this position.
  • Being able to manage multiple projects with tight deadlines.
  • This role has significant room for growth for an ambitious individual with the right skill set and the ability to think outside the box.

REQUIREMENTS

  • You're a quick learner with a 'can do' attitude.
  • Experience in strategy, risk and/or technology and innovation is a plus.
  • You're outgoing with the ability to take on a project and deliver to tight deadlines.
  • Technical, business, or legal background with an engineering, law, business, or technology qualification preferred.
  • Exceptional research, communication, and presentation skills.
  • The ability to write clearly and concisely.
  • And of course, you have a great attitude – you don't take yourself too seriously and are fun to work with.

We offer competitive remuneration and benefits, and every employee can earn a bonus. EverEdge has a dynamic and distinct culture, where responsibility is rewarded with huge opportunities for development and career growth.

If you're up for a unique challenge within a great team, we'd love to hear from you.

column4: McDonald's opened its first restaurant in Singapore in 1979. column3: PetroChina International is the “Trading Arm” of PetroChina Company Ltd, and is one of the world’s largest global commodity trading companies.

NatSteel is one of the largest steel producers in the Asia Pacific. With operations spanning Malaysia, Hong Kong, Singapore, Thailand and Vietnam, NatSteel produces more than two million tonnes of high quality steel products for the construction industry annually. 

Headquartered in Singapore, NatSteel's products are used in the construction of residential, industrial and commercial buildings, as well as infrastructural projects. Some of these iconic structures include Changi Airport, Marina Bay Sands and Resorts World integrated resorts.

","

Job Responsibilities:

The Data Analyst purpose is to ‘turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions.'

  1. Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports
  2. Interpreting data, analyzing results using statistical techniques
  3. Developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality
  4. Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain data systems
  5. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
  6. Undertaking data collection, preprocessing (structured and unstructured data), data-filtering, data-cleansing and analysis
  7. Analyze large amounts of raw information to discover trends and find patterns
  8. Work with business stakeholders to prioritize business decision and information needs using Analytics
  9. Building models to address business problems using predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
  10. Presenting information using data visualization techniques
  11. Collaborate with business teams to use data to identify and resolve issues causing operational inefficiency and ineffectiveness
  12. Use data to locate and define new business process improvement opportunities

Job Requirements:

  • Degree in Mathematics, Information Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics or other relevant streams
  • Min 1-3 years of relevant working experience
  • Knowledge of R, SQL and Python; familiarity with Scala, Java or C++
  • Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Power BI) and data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop)
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with
  • attention to detail and accuracy
  • Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets
  • Knowledge of using Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence tools on AWS, Azure or Google would be beneficial
  • Good interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
  • Good analytical, problem solving and solution building skills
  • Analytical mind and business acumen
  • Strong mathematical skills (e.g. statistics, algebra)
  • Strong aptitude to learn and become adept in new programming languages

<div style=""text-align:justify"">

Carro is an automotive marketplace that offers a full-stack service for all aspects of car ownership. By offering a trustworthy and transparent experience, Carro challenges the traditional way of buying and selling cars through a proprietary pricing algorithm.

Besides selling cars, Carro provides services that offer a car owner everything they need throughout their car ownership journey. In 2019, Carro introduced the First Car Subscription Service in Singapore. The new service aims to provide Singaporeans with a commitment-free car ownership experience, unlike the traditional.

Carro’s technology-driven services leverage innovation and technology to provide consumers with a seamless experience. These include an in-house financing solution through its sister company Genie Financial Services and a suite of after-sales services such as an in-house car care workshop and Singapore’s first on-demand roadside recovery platform. In 2020, Carro redefined the car buying experience with Singapore’s first contactless service, providing consumers with added assurance through a 3-day return policy and 30-day wear and tear guarantee.
Best Funded Automotive Marketplace

Founded in 2015, Carro is Southeast Asia’s largest automotive marketplace, with the company having expanded to Thailand and Indonesia in 2017. Carro’s expansion coincides with exponential year-on-year growth, recording over US$100 million worth of transactions in 2016, with figures doubling to over US$250 million in 2017 and again doubling to US$500 million in 2018. In 2020, the total transactions stand at over US$1 billion.

In August 2019, Carro closed their Series B funding round at US$90 million. The round was supported by notable names such as SoftBank Ventures Asia, EDBI Pte Ltd, Insignia Ventures Partners, B Capital Group and many more. Overall, Carro has raised US$105 million since its inception. The funding has allowed the company to expand its presence across Southeast Asia and improve existing services in its automotive ecosystem.

","

We're looking for an experienced data scientist to start and lead our data science efforts. Do you love sifting through data troves to find gems to analyse? Read on! We’re looking for a data scientist to help us to dice and mince the big data into trends and analytics. This is a hands-on role, but you’ll have full autonomy in choosing the toolkit and approach you want to apply to achieve a data objective. You will have ownership over important project areas that include defining the roadmap of data science. You will work with our structured and unstructured data to find a pattern/trend of how our users are using the product and present these insight reports to the business stakeholders. You have a sharp mind and hands-on approach when it comes to tackling technical challenges.

What you will be doing:

  • Exploring and visualizing large datasets to drive insights
  • Fluid at extracting and transforming data from systems.
  • Fluid at practical data mining techniques (pattern detection, predictive modeling, anomaly detection, and optimization) to identify areas of improvement for business/product
  • Identify and highlight areas of opportunities to help business/product owners optimize existing or new business opportunities/processes
  • Applying machine learning techniques for a variety of modeling and relevance problems
  • Assist with developing strategies and managing operational metric for various projects
Requirements

What you will need:

  • Master or Bachelor in Computer Science, Statistics, Industrial Engineering, Mathematics, Economics or quantitative discipline
  • At least 2 years of hands-on experience in a Data Science role with exposure and proficiency in quantitative and statistical analysis, predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and algorithm-optimization for machine learning. Commercial experience are highly desirable.
  • Strong knowledge in big data ETL processes, data, and data exploration algorithms
  • Strong working knowledge of data science algorithms including decision trees, probability networks, association rules, clustering, regression, and neural networks
  • Fluid in programming skills (MySQL, SQL, Python, R or similar)
  • Fluid in a variety of visualization tools
  • Broad-minded with attention to detail and strong business acumens and insights
  • Excellent communication skills (oral, written, and presentation skills) to work with various stakeholders (technical and non-technical) including presentation of insights reports to business/product owners
  • Experience working with a product-based organization, e-commerce, automotive is advantageous

column3: The Ng Teng Fong General Hospital (NTFGH) and Jurong Community Hospital (JCH) are members of the National University Health System (NUHS), a leading academic health system and one of three public healthcare clusters in Singapore.

Known as the JurongHealth Campus, NTFGH and JCH are Singapore’s first integrated healthcare development designed and built together from the ground up. Designed around the patients’ needs, the twin development enables NTFGH patients who no longer require acute care to be easily transferred to rehabilitate and recuperate in JCH. Both hospitals are also managed by one healthcare team to facilitate integration at all levels to enable better patient care, greater efficiency and convenience. NTFGH is also the first in Singapore and ASEAN to attain HIMSS EMRAM Stage 7, with JCH at HiMSS EMRAM Stage 6 – an achievement which recognises hospitals with the highest level of adoption and utilisation of electronic medical record functions.

As part of an integrated academic health system, NTFGH and JCH, in collaboration with partners in the healthcare continuum, aims to transform healthcare to deliver holistic and seamless patient-centred care.
For more information, please visit www.ntfgh.com.sg | www.jch.com.sg | www.nuhs.edu.sg
Delivering ‘Incredible care and health, together!’
Members of the NUHS:
• National University Hospital
• Ng Teng Fong General Hospital
• Alexandra Hospital
• Jurong Community Hospital
• National University Polyclinics
• National University Cancer Centre, Singapore
• National University Heart Centre, Singapore
• National University Centre for Oral Health, Singapore
• NUS Yong Loo Lin School of Medicine
• NUS Faculty of Dentistry
• NUS Saw Swee Hock School of Public Health

The incumbent shall:

  • Self-motivated, ability to multitask and prioritize projects to meet deadlines

Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) is the world’s leading professional services firm in the areas of risk, strategy and people. The Company’s 81,000 colleagues advise clients in 130 countries.  With annual revenue over $19 billion, Marsh McLennan helps clients navigate an increasingly dynamic and complex environment through four market-leading businesses. Marsh advises individual and commercial clients of all sizes on insurance broking and innovative risk management solutions. Guy Carpenter develops advanced risk, reinsurance and capital strategies that help clients grow profitably and pursue emerging opportunities. Mercer delivers advice and technology-driven solutions that help organizations redefine the world of work, reshape retirement and investment outcomes, and unlock health and wellbeing for a changing workforce. Oliver Wyman serves as a critical strategic, economic and brand advisor to private sector and governmental clients. ","
Description:

Welcome to Brighter!
Ready to be part of a company that is not only leading the market, but transforming in the most exciting way? In Singapore, we are a team of experts who believe in building brighter futures for our clients and community by redefining the world of work, reshaping retirement and investment outcomes, and unlocking real health and wellbeing.
At Mercer, we walk the talk:
Voted #1 HR Consulting Company globally
Recognized as Asset Consultant of the Year for 4 consecutive years by Asia Asset Management
Named Best Employee Engagement Consultancy and Best Corporate Wellness Provider by Human Resources Online
Great Package and Recognition Programs
Energetic & flexible environment surrounded by supportive colleagues
In order to support our team and strengthen the growth of our APAC business, we are looking for a; HR Data Analyst
What you can expect:
This is a highly visible role across the wider Asia group and reporting to the Senior People Partner who is based in Singapore.
You will be a strong, savvy and highly competent HR Analyst with a technical capability to deliver a lot of data driven work, reports and projects to really be able add value in your offerings to the region where the main bulk of the work will stem from.

Being proactive in the way you conduct yourself in this role will be imperative as the work involves working with multiple stakeholders and a magnitude of information and data sets and therefore advanced knowledge of Excel, spreadsheets, MS office, Powerpoint, Workday HRIS tools will set you up for success here.

You will be expected to be inquisitive in your delivery of work with a strong capability to read trends across variation of subjects and be able to provide trend analysis and insights.
There is a long-term career track to create a Data Analytics COE for HR in Asia and if you are interested in a specialized career path here or a career track in another area of HR as an HRBP then we have future opportunities to evolve you and your career.

The role
Provide data analysis & action – create reports and analyze HR data to lead data-based decisions about Mercer’s people management including development of standard reporting packs as well as ad-hoc reporting and analysis
Organize, coordinates and evaluates the reconciliation of detailed transactions from HR systems working in conjunction with People Partners in Asia and business.
Assists in Year-End Performance and Compensation Review and be involved in reviewing trends in performance, compensation evaluation and decision-making in the organization to make data-driven decisions about rewarding and recognizing colleagues
You will play a hand at employee engagement to analyze employee engagement data across the Asia region to surface key insights about areas for development for the organization and develop and recommend action plans for implementation to improve the employee experience

We will count on you to:
Administer processes and templates for developing HR analytics
Analyzes transactions based on data from the Workday systems
Performs database audits when necessary; cleans up historical data in various spreadsheets and HRIS systems
Assists in various ad-hoc projects working with large data sets
Analyzes HR costs by tracking transformation costs and savings across the corporation by leveraging data from various sources
Communicates with other members of the HR People Partner team & HRM & HRS Teams performing ad hoc analysis for select work streams
Workday – Become an expert in the use of Workday (Mercer’s HR management system of record), able to provide support to HR colleagues in executing HR business processes. Proactively ensure data integrity of HR systems, identify discrepancies, and recommend changes to address issues
What you need to have:
A strong HR Analytics background
Microsoft office
Advanced proficiency of Excel, Powerpoint and Workday HRIS
A degree or study towards HRIS management or HR Management minimum Undergrad level/Bachelors degree.

We integrate technology and data science with clinical care to deliver personalised lifestyle and health solutions at scale.

","About NOVI

At NOVI Health, we're positively changing the way healthcare is delivered by integrating traditional medical practice with consumer tech – providing a full-stack health solution based on motivational software, data science, and fitness and diet coaching at scale, all in addition to traditional health screening and medical care.

As we continue to scale, we’re building our data science and machine learning capabilities to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of our offering.


Who We're Looking For

You will help build our company's analytics and data science initiatives with exploratory projects, set up a business intelligence dashboard, and be a key driver in creating and scaling a quality patient-centric experience.

You will ensure that routine data analysis and reporting needs are met, as well as work closely with the management team to answer critical questions spanning areas such as business, product and marketing through various projects. 

Responsibilities include:

  • Using automated tools to extract data from primary and secondary sources
  • Developing and maintaining databases
  • Performing analysis to assess quality of data
  • Using statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets that could be helpful for meeting the business objectives
  • Preparing reports for the management and other stakeholders, stating trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data

Projects can include:

  • Making sense of our existing datasets: demographics, medical data, app usage & behavioural analytics, customer acquisition data, financial metrics
  • Conducting exploratory investigations to gain insights to support strategic decision-making, prioritisation of feature development, identification of weaknesses, increased customer acquisition and reduced churn. 
  • Building our metrics dashboard to empower our team to easily extract and gain valuable business insights
  • Recommending and executing automation improvements for sustainable reporting and tracking for the wider team
  • Assisting in medical research projects with external partners relating to clinical stratification and medical outcomes

You should
  • Be interested in joining an early stage startup disrupting the health tech industry
  • Have experience with data analysis across diverse fields
  • Be proficient with Excel / Google Sheets
  • Be proficient with one or more BI tools (e.g. Qlik, Tableau, Power BI)
  • Be proficient in programming languages for data analysis, e.g. Python, SQL
  • Possess a critical eye paired with good statistical knowledge
  • Have at least 3 years experience in a data science / data analyst / statistician role

What we value
  • Good communication skills are highly valued. Your work should be highly expressive, and you should be good at communicating your intent and thought process behind every piece of work
  • Ability to proactively scope out work and take ownership over the company’s analytics and data science efforts
  • Positive attitude, attention to detail, and good initiative 

Nice-to-haves
  • Experience working within healthcare or similar industries
  • Knowledge or experience with machine learning / data science
Why Work With NOVI

We are an early-stage startup, so you will have a big part to play in shaping the work that will be done, as well as the culture. If being able to have a hand in many projects across many disciplines excites you, or if you are looking to maximise learning opportunities, then this might be a good fit.

In addition, if you appreciate flexibility in working hours and location, thrive with independence, yet value good communication practices – you'll enjoy working with us. This is a chance to do work that has a meaningful and direct impact on people's health and lives – you'll be able to see first-hand how our patients become healthier and happier, because of our efforts. If you're excited by this and having a hand in disrupting the healthcare industry, we'd love to talk to you!

This role would be a 1 year contract to start, with a salary range of $4000-5500. Only available to Singaporeans at this time.

As a Senior Data Analyst, you will be in-charged of mobile analysis and apply Machine learning model. You will also be doing data mining on day to day basis.

Client Details

Once of the big tech company in video game industry. They recently made a big acquisition, thus they are expanding their data team to capture Asia market.

Description

As a Qualified Senior Data Analyst, you are responsible:

  • Provide insights to understand the impact of product decisions
  • Working with the development teams to help determine what data needs to be captured
  • Analyzing gameplay and economy telemetry data to understand the impact of overall player experience, before and after the product launches
  • Analyzing game and player data to understand the player behaviour and enhance the quality of the player experience
  • Regularly performing ad hoc analyses for development, live ops, and performance marketing teams
  • Presenting findings taken from data analysis both in person and in presentation form for remote groups
  • Designing, testing and implementing scalable and repeatable model framework for user acquisition, engagement and monetization strategies around liveops
  • Defining and establishing business KPIs as well as creating and distributing regular performance reports and dashboards

Profile

As a Qualified Candidates, you shall possess:

  • B.A. or B.S. in Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering Sciences (or in another quantitative discipline)
  • At least 5 years of experience in data mining & analytics with very large, complex and multi-dimensional data sets
  • Experience with predictive modelling techniques and accomplished in use of one of the statistical software packages like R, or Python
  • Knowledge of one or more of the following: time series, experimental design, classification, clustering, and regression analysis
  • Expert in relational databases, and proficient with SQL
  • Advanced experience with Tableau or other similar visualization tools

Nice to have:

  • Experience with machine learning and deep learning
  • Experience with big data technologies such as Spark, Hadoop, or Hive
  • Knowledge of free-to-play mobile game economics and/or performance marketing

Job Offer

  • Flexible WFH arrangement
  • Good company culture

To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Wilson Tay on +65 6416 9838

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

","

Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

As part of Group T&O, our team is dedicated towards the governance of frameworks and libraries are, with a critical eye towards architecture and best practices. As these frameworks and libraries are used across a wide swathe of DBS applications, it is imperative that they remain grounded in sound software development principles, allowing for higher code quality and maintainability.

Responsibilities

Technical Business Analyst

  • Create technical documentation and technical user guides for Developers within DBS

  • Provide technical requirements for user stories for the team

Project Management/Agile

  • Facilitate sprint planning, retrospective and sprint demos

  • Define, manage and maintain metrics : Governance Initiatives and Team's Efficiency

  • Tracking of roadmap and milestones

  • Implement initiative to improve efficiency of the team

  • Manage communication with external teams (e.g Newsletters, Presentations)

Requirements

  • Experience as a Technical BA and proficient in creating technical documentation

  • Experience as a Project Management or Agile Methodologies

  • Experience with JIRA and Confluence

  • Experience with Excel and PowerPoint

  • Hands-on attitude and passion for technology

  • Exposure to Frontend Development

  • Ability to create basic code examples in one or more current programming/scripting languages

  • Ability to read and understand Reactjs

  • Basic design skills would be a plus

  • Ability to resolve dependencies between team and third parties

  • Ability to facilitate problem solving between developers, internal customers and third parties

Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

We are a well-established multi-national heavy lift, transportation and project construction company with a regional office based in Singapore. Mammoet is the world‘s leading tailor-made heavy lifting and multimodal transport solutions specialist.

Our core business is the transport, shipping, installation (including horizontal and vertical positioning) and removal of heavy or large objects, to and from any location, onshore and offshore. Mammoet’s activities are focused on the petrochemical industry, civil engineering projects, the power generation sector, offshore and marine projects.

Our engineering skills, experience, thousands of highly skilled professionals and a vast fleet of state-of-the-art equipment, combined with high quality and safety standards, have made Mammoet a market leader, setting trends and records around the world
","

Stop sending. Start connecting.

“Working across many cultures and time zones means clear communication is essential. Don’t let all the technology fool you – communication is always about people. People connecting and not just sending. People interacting and not just information overloading. Looking each other in the eyes and understanding.”

Mammoet is full of people who love what they do. Loyal, hardworking and with a desire to find the best way to do their job. They are open and outspoken. Even blunt at times. But always with a sense of humor and respect for each other’s qualities. When you spread this attitude around the world amazing things can happen. If you want to be the best you can possibly be, then Mammoet might just be your company. Reach out and join us. You’ll be surprised by the difference you can make.

Job Description

As the Data Analyst Intern, your day to day job responsibilities includes:

  • Reaching out to stakeholders to understand business challenges and opportunities
  • Develop market entry/ industry analysis roadmap with actions and create insightful reports

Requirements

  • Degree in Business Administration or equivalent
  • High proficiency in Powerpoint and Excel
  • Possess the initiative, sense of urgency and entrepreneurship
  • Display problem solving skills and eager to learn new systems and technology
  • Exhibit the ability to work in a fast-paced environment and able to work with minimum supervision
  • Strong analytical and communication skills

About our Company

Mammoet has a culture which is informal, open, and professional, geared to new technological developments, customer service, and satisfaction among the employees.

Mammoet is full of people who love what they do. Loyal, hardworking, and with a desire to find the best way to do their job. They are open and outspoken. Even blunt at times. But always with a sense of humor and respect for each other’s qualities. When you spread this attitude around the world amazing things can happen. If you want to be the best you can possibly be, then Mammoet might just be your company. Reach out and join us. You’ll be surprised by the difference you can make.

Mammoet helps clients improve construction efficiency and optimize the uptime of plants and installations. For that purpose, we provide solutions for lifting, transporting, installing, and decommissioning large and heavy structures.

Realizing those solutions is an integrated daily effort, shared by everyone at Mammoet, in every aspect of our services: creative engineering, careful planning, and safe delivery.

60,data,/en/job/data-analytic-intern-9312571,9312571,Data Analytic Intern,False,False,,,SGD,Dun & Bradstreet (Singapore) Pte Ltd,22-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200003058W,,,51 - 200 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: Growing Relationships Through Data
Dun & Bradstreet (Singapore) Pte Ltd grows the most valuable relationships in business by uncovering truth and meaning from data.
We Help You Grow Relationships Through Data
Growth is the lifeblood of business, and its most fundamental driver is the relationships a company fosters with prospects, customers and partners.

Over nearly two centuries of helping businesses understand this dynamic, we have honed the expertise of how data and analytics forge the relationships that lead to industry-leading performance. To activate these capabilities, we build – or co-develop with partners – solutions tailored to your role, whether you are in marketing, sales, finance, supply, compliance or information technology. And we deliver this content however you want to consume it.

Our platform’s foundation is the world’s largest commercial database, with over 240 million company records we derive from 30,000 data sources and update 5 million times per day. We integrate this insight into your core systems, workflows and cloud-based apps in ways that enhance their impact, and we also integrate with your existing data and third-party data sources. Our DUNSRight® process gives us the unmatched ability to turn an enormous stream of data into the high-quality information you need to grow your most valuable relationships.

We offer a wide range of solutions for Risk & Finance, Sales and Marketing, Human Resource and Operations professionals. And some of the largest, most successful technology and service companies in the world embed Dun & Bradstreet data within their offerings. These companies include SalesForce, Oracle, KPMG and SAP.
We Have Served Diverse Organizations Locally and Globally

From banking to high-tech, from retail to energy, more than 34,000 companies and 87% of the Fortune 500 trust Dun & Bradstreet to provide critical data and insights they need to create every-day connections with their most valuable constituents.
Interested candidates, please email a detailed resume stating the position applied for in the subject matter and stating your current and expected salary via ""Apply Now""
* We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column2:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue of approximately $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving complex analytical challenges, increasing productivity in their laboratories, improving patient health through diagnostics or the development and manufacture of life-changing therapies, we are here to support them. Our global team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an unrivaled combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services, Patheon and PPD. For more information, please visit www.thermofisher.com.","
How Will You Make an Impact?
IES is the Service Organization for Thermo Fisher Scientific and this role would provide exposure to general laboratory and analytical equipment.
What will you do?
  • Using automated tools eg. Power BI to extract data from primary and secondary sources
  • Using statistical tools to interpret data sets, paying particular attention to trends and patterns
  • Working alongside teams within the business or the management team to establish business needs
  • Assist in preparing reports for the team to effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data.
How will you get here?
Education
  • Currently pursuing Degree in Computer Science, Mathematical Science, or related discipline
Experience
  • Good to have experience in using Power BI
Knowledge, Skills, Abilities
  • Analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Good Microsoft Excel Skills eg. Pivot Table, Vlookup, Formulas
  • Knowledge in Power BI is a plus
  • Accuracy and attention to details
Learning outcome (at least 3 points):
 
Technical Skills & Competencies:
  • Data Analytical Skills
  • Problem-Solving Skills
  • Product Knowledge on general laboratory and analytical equipment.

NTT DATA Group provides its clients world-class IT solutions. Its vast experience in end-to-end solutions for diverse industries, on many different platforms, allows them to deliver measurable results that meet or exceed every expectation. Its IT service portfolio includes business consulting, design, implementation and operation & maintenance support.  NTT DATA’s solution portfolio extends to Industrial package implementation, SAP, Business Intelligence, Financial Service, Cloud Service and Public infrastructures such as custom clearing, geographical information system and etc.

NTT DATA is actively hiring career minded professionals who want to grow with the company that believes in the success of our clients and our employees.  If you are interested, visit us at www.nttdata.com to discover more about us.  We invite qualified applicants for the following position.

","

Responsibilities:

  • The Technical Manager will be leading a team of tech lead, data engineers, BI developers, data scientist and machine learning (ML) developers. The Technical Manager shall be the Subject Matter Expert that would be able to envision, articulate/design, build, deploy and operationalise Big Data + AI / ML solutions, and he/she will be accountable for the overall technology strategy.
  • In this role, the technical manager will be responsible for detailed solution design and technical accelerators such as Proof of Value (POV)/Proof of Concept (POC) projects. He/She will direct technical resources from the team to design and scale cohesive solutions.
  • The technical manager will also work closely with the Sales team to close deals, supporting the team through the full sales process of solutions engineering and presentation, standard and/or customised solutions demonstration, customer workshop, development of proposals and work with the sales team to address RFI/RFP-related queries from customers. In addition, he/she will act as a consultant to the delivery team for development and deployment of solutions so as to ensure smooth transition from post-sales implementation to Go-live stage.

Requirements:

  • Expert level skills in big data technologies like Cloudera Hadoop, SQL Big Data Cluster, HDFS, components of Hadoop like Sqoop/ Hive/ Pig/ Ranger & Spark.
  • Understanding of Cloud technologies for Big Data.
  • Able to create POC projects with limited tools in short time to showcase the intended solution for the client.
  • Have good understanding and hands on for ML development, and possess experience in AI/ML integration to the overall IT infrastructure.
  • Experienced level skills with Design Thinking, Agile and MLOps method.
  • Able to conduct research and development in Computer Vision, Speech Recognition, Natural Language Processing and other related fields.
  • Ability to drive workshop with customer during pre-sales and in-project stages.
  • Able to design and review data architecture, and to create and/or improve algorithm/model performance.
  • Ability to work collaboratively and productively with team.
  • Ability to manage ambiguity, yet producing tangible results.
  • Ability to effectively manage challenging situations without loss of focus when under pressure.

Technical and Professional Expertise:

  • At least 5+ years of relevant industry experience in architecting and solutioning Big Data + AI/ML technologies.
  • Preferably possess a master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence or related discipline.
  • At least completed 3 Big Data + AI/ML projects.
  • At least one major Cloud Certification.
  • Proficiency in at least 1 or more languages such as: R, Python, SPSS.
  • Proficiency in at least 1 or more BI tools such as: PowerBI, Tableau, Qlik.
  • Knowledge of various software technologies, methodologies and applied software engineering practices/standards.
  • Manage critical client impacting events related to solution and engage with delivery, transition etc.

Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.

The successful incumbent must be/possess the following attributes:

  • At least a Diploma/Degree in Business Administration/Statistics or any discipline

  • Good focus, accuracy and attention to detail is essential

Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Summary

You will be part of Digital and Data (DDDOM) team in the DBS Corporate Real Estate unit (CRESA). This role will support the Data Lead in a deputy role, to oversee and guide the wider team, supporting the team in driving key analytical projects and outcomes. This is a role that span four domains of skills: business knowledge/acumen, statistical/mathematical reasoning, programming and managerial skills.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead a team of Data Analysts and Tableau Developer to work in a cross-functional AGILE manner with stakeholders in defining problem statements, collecting data and building analytical models to make suitable recommendations to drive business targets

  • Overseeing team's data applications, infrastructure and pipeline

  • Partnering working teams closely to design experiments through use of data and iterate towards the targeted business outcomes

  • Effectively bridge the gap between business needs and data science capabilities - to identify areas of opportunities, leveraging on real-time analytics to shape stronger intervention strategies in achieving our digital outcomes

  • Provide thought leadership based on current business and industry trends in advanced analytics, and to scale the team's data science and modelling capabilities

  • Lead the team to apply statistical approaches and proactively identify meaningful insights through exploratory data analysis, and to present/share results of the data analysis with the squad members in an easily digestible format

  • Work with stakeholders to measure and report on business outcomes; routinely communicate findings, trends, recommendations and other key indicators to leadership

  • Design and build automated reporting dashboards on our data visualization platforms

  • Elevate data literacy within CRESA, and data science knowledge within DDDOM

  • Champion for responsible use of data (RDU) within CRESA

  • Collaborate and support with finance team on annual finance budgeting exercise 

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Business Analytics, or equivalent quantitative fields preferred

  • Strong mathematical and statistics background

  • Preferably with minimum 6-8 years of experience in a business/data analyst function or in building statistical data model sets

  • End to end data science workflow experience, starting from data extraction, wrangling, modelling and deployment in production environment

  • Proficient in Talend, Tableau with strong working experience in Python, SQL, Hadoop eco-system (Hive, HDFS, Pig etc.)

  • Good to have related experience in process improvements, AGILE methodologies, project management and leading change management

  • Business knowledge or prior experience in banking and/or real estate industry would be advantageous

  • Experience in delivering complex initiatives working with both cross functional stakeholders across business and tech team

  • Self-starter, good communication and presentation skill

Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

SVP, Private Wealth Data Analyst - Regional Data Management, Consumer Banking Group - (210000BU)
Business Function
As the leading bank in Asia, DBS Consumer Banking Group is in a unique position to help our customers realise their dreams and ambitions. As a market leader in the consumer banking business, DBS has a full spectrum of products and services, including deposits, investments, insurance, mortgages, credit cards and personal loans, to help our customers realise their dreams and aspirations at every life stage. The data function sits within the business and is a key enabler of transformative change to deliver incremental value and outcomes for the Consumer Banking and Wealth Management Group.
Responsibilities
  • Team lead role, responsible for driving incremental value for the wealth management franchise through use of data - accountable for financial outcomes.
  • Identify and enable delivery of use cases to drive business outcomes.
  • Drive continuous improvement through adoption of test and learn and experimentation to increase effectiveness of data driven engagement with our customers. Set metrics, framework and governance to drive continuous improvement.
  • Drive adoption of a data driven operating model and control tower build out for key lines of business, to enhance the way we operate the business.
  • Work with front office, business managers, product managers and customer management teams to create data solutions, address business challenges and identify untapped opportunities.
  • End-to-end data solutioning which includes translate business problems into data requirements, data discovery and data processing to deliver outcome.
Requirement
  • 8 years' experience in financial institution or top tier consulting.
  • Experience working on cross-functional data projects to solve business problem and drive business outcomes.
  • Prior experience or exposure to private bank or wealth management domain.
  • Proficient in SQL/Python/SAS programming, MS Excel and be comfortable with processing large volume of data.
  • Experience in delivering complex initiatives working with both cross functional stakeholders across business and tech team.
  • Self-starter, good communication and presentation skill.
Apply Now
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

67,data,/en/job/data-scientist-9353206,9353206,Data Scientist,False,False,5500,7500,SGD,Carro Singapore,21-Mar-22,False,,9 days,201525411C,,,1001 - 2000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:center"">
<div style=""text-align:justify"">

Carro is an automotive marketplace that offers a full-stack service for all aspects of car ownership. By offering a trustworthy and transparent experience, Carro challenges the traditional way of buying and selling cars through a proprietary pricing algorithm.

Besides selling cars, Carro provides services that offer a car owner everything they need throughout their car ownership journey. In 2019, Carro introduced the First Car Subscription Service in Singapore. The new service aims to provide Singaporeans with a commitment-free car ownership experience, unlike the traditional.

Carro’s technology-driven services leverage innovation and technology to provide consumers with a seamless experience. These include an in-house financing solution through its sister company Genie Financial Services and a suite of after-sales services such as an in-house car care workshop and Singapore’s first on-demand roadside recovery platform. In 2020, Carro redefined the car buying experience with Singapore’s first contactless service, providing consumers with added assurance through a 3-day return policy and 30-day wear and tear guarantee.
Best Funded Automotive Marketplace

Founded in 2015, Carro is Southeast Asia’s largest automotive marketplace, with the company having expanded to Thailand and Indonesia in 2017. Carro’s expansion coincides with exponential year-on-year growth, recording over US$100 million worth of transactions in 2016, with figures doubling to over US$250 million in 2017 and again doubling to US$500 million in 2018. In 2020, the total transactions stand at over US$1 billion.

In August 2019, Carro closed their Series B funding round at US$90 million. The round was supported by notable names such as SoftBank Ventures Asia, EDBI Pte Ltd, Insignia Ventures Partners, B Capital Group and many more. Overall, Carro has raised US$105 million since its inception. The funding has allowed the company to expand its presence across Southeast Asia and improve existing services in its automotive ecosystem.

","

Singapore's No 1 fastest-growing company in 2021 is looking for an experienced data scientist to start and lead our data science efforts. Do you love sifting through data troves to find gems to analyze? Read on! We’re looking for a data scientist to help us to dice and mince the big data into trends and analytics. This is a hands-on role, but you’ll have full autonomy in choosing the toolkit and approach you want to apply to achieve a data objectively. You will have ownership over important project areas that include defining the roadmap of data science. You will work with our structured and unstructured data to find a pattern/trend of how our users are using the product and present these insight reports to the business stakeholders. You have a sharp mind and a hands-on approach when it comes to tackling technical challenges.

What you will be doing:

  • Exploring and visualizing large datasets to drive insights
  • Fluid at extracting and transforming data from systems.
  • Fluid at practical data mining techniques (pattern detection, predictive modeling, anomaly detection, and optimization) to identify areas of improvement for business/product
  • Identify and highlight areas of opportunities to help business/product owners optimize existing or new business opportunities/processes
  • Applying machine learning techniques for a variety of modeling and relevance problems
  • Assist with developing strategies and managing operational metrics for various projects

What you will need:

  • Master or Bachelor in Computer Science, Statistics, Industrial Engineering, Mathematics, Economics or quantitative discipline
  • At least 2 years of hands-on experience in a Data Science role with exposure and proficiency in quantitative and statistical analysis, predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and algorithm optimization for machine learning. Commercial experience is highly desirable.
  • Strong knowledge in big data ETL processes, data, and data exploration algorithms
  • Strong working knowledge of data science algorithms including decision trees, probability networks, association rules, clustering, regression, and neural networks
  • Fluid in programming skills (MySQL, SQL, Python, R, or similar)
  • Fluid in a variety of visualization tools
  • Broad-minded with attention to detail and strong business acumens and insights

column2:
MOH Holdings (MOHH) is the holding company of Singapore’s public healthcare clusters – National University Health System, National Healthcare Group and Singapore Health Services. Sharing the Ministry of Health’s vision to champion a healthy nation and ensure that our people live well, live long and with peace of mind, our role is to enhance public healthcare sector performance by unlocking synergies and economies of scale.","
MOHH Group Internal Audit division supports 17 Audit Committees and 10 Boards in the audit and advisory activities of public healthcare sector. Within the division, Financial & Operational audit unit supports the clusters, corporate entities and fund boards in managing their financial and operational risks, through audit and advisory activities.Reporting to the Deputy Director of GIA, the successful candidate will assist in:
  • Planning, performing, analysis, reporting and follow-up of the Internal Audit department's data extraction and analysis requirements
  • Supports the Data Analytics team in its efforts to identify and drive data mining efforts through a risk based approach
  • Mitigate fraud, identify misconduct and control gaps through utilizing data mining and analysis.
  • Design, extract, normalize, analyze, review and automate analysis for Internal Audit utilizing enterprise data warehouse, extracts and data mining and analysis
  • Coordinate with business for outside data source requirements.
Requirements :
  • Diploma/Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science or Accounting
  • Minimum 1-2 years of experience in Analytics, technology or auditing.
  • Strong internal audit foundation and skills.
  • Experience with IDEA or similar data analysis tools.
  • Proficient in the use of SQL, MS SQL server (SSIS/SSAS experience preferred), Data Visualization (e.g. Tableau or other), Programming Language (e.g. Python) and MS Excel, Visual Basic, and Sharepoint.
  • Strong analytical skills a must; ability to apply business logic to design and implement data mining techniques on large data sets.
  • Possess strong problem solving and critical thinking skills.
  • Experience in designing, developing, implementing and maintaining a database and programs to manage data analysis efforts.
  • Working knowledge of data mining and predictive modeling tools and techniques a plus.
  • Working knowledge of application development and/or web development a plus.
  • Demonstrated ability to work independently and within a team in a fast changing environment with changing priorities and changing time constraints.
  • Able to work under pressure.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and ability to multi-task.

column1: 70,data,/en/job/senior-analyst-data-science-office-of-insights-analytics-9407517,9407517,"Senior Analyst (Data Science), Office of Insights & Analytics",False,False,,,SGD,Singapore Health Services Pte Ltd (SingHealth HQ),23-Mar-22,False,,,200002698Z,,,1001 - 2000 Employees,,,"<div>

SingHealth HQ is the headquarters of SingHealth, the largest public healthcare cluster in Singapore. We focus on cluster-wide, strategic core functions for the organisation and work closely with our institutions and care teams to facilitate excellent care for our patients.

We offer a diverse variety of roles that you can fulfil your career aspirations in. You can choose from domain areas such as medical and clinical services, regional health system, research, education, organisational transformation and informatics, as well as corporate services including operations, finance, human resources, legal and communications. These comprise healthcare administration roles and other unique jobs such as genetic counsellors and clinical research nurses.

","

You will be responsible for the design, development and implementation of analytical models through strategic use of data assets for delivering efficient and effective healthcare. You will design, code and conceptualise solutions that address the organisation’s challenges through the use of appropriate data and techniques in Data Science, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. You will drive the end-to-end Machine Learning Operations pipeline to ensure that solutions are validated and tested using the best practices of test-driven development, and deployed with model monitoring and continuous re-training/integration in order to make an impact to and benefit users.

You will collaborate with stakeholders to frame and scope business problems, and build data analytics capabilities for the various domains across clinical services, finance and operations. You will also conduct feasibility studies and lead translational research projects as required, and facilitate regular key management meetings and reporting.

Job Requirements

  • Masters or Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Operations Research, Engineering, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Knowledge Engineering or related quantitative disciplines. Doctorate Degree is an advantage. 
  • Preferably at least 5 years of hands-on experience in data mining, machine learning modelling (computer vision, natural language processing, regression, time-series etc) and optimisation. Candidate with more years of experience may be considered for a more senior position. 
  • Prior experience in Healthcare is an advantage.
  • Working experience in using Natural Language Processing (NLP) methods to extract relevant data from unstructured/semi-structured dataset
  • Experience in designing non-trivial data related technical solutions and deploying them in an actual user setting
  • Proficient in applied machine learning methodology which includes Exploratory Data Analysis, data cleaning & preparation, model training & hyper parameter tuning, model selection, and model deployment.
  • Proficient in data science and statistical oriented programming using languages such as Python, R and Scala.
  • Proficient in machine learning and NLP frameworks such as sklearn, tensorflow, Pytorch, spacy, HuggingFace, etc. Knowledgeable in SQL, Hadoop/Spark, Graph Database and related databases
  • Strong problem-solving and quantitative computational skills
  • Strong written and oral communication skills
  • Meticulous and able to work effectively both independently and in a team
  • Must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19

Prestige BioPharma (PBP) is a Singapore based pharmaceutical group focusing on development of biosimilars and new antibody therapeutics. Visit https://www.prestigebiopharma.com/Over the last few years, we have achieved a breakthrough in the R&D of our pipeline products and established a strong presence and network with customers and suppliers worldwide, actively securing into more and more global pharmaceutical markets.","

Data and Automation Engineer (Reporting to Director of R&D)

Role

The Data and Automation Engineer will work across science and technology to solve complex scientific data problems in a dynamic research environment. They will assist in designing, implementing, and maintaining the tools and infrastructure to organize and empower our scientific data processes and automate our workflows. They will work with scientists to enable seamless collection, organization, sharing, and processing of the data we produce. The ideal candidate will have a background working with life science organizations, experience with a variety of scientific data types, and expertise in automation and integration tools.

Responsibilities

  • Work closely with scientists to understand their workflow, data, and automation needs to drive deployment of technology solutions.
  • Develop solutions leveraging and configuring commercial or custom processes to solve business problems.
  • Work collaboratively with internal IT colleagues to build a cohesive data system within the company.
  • Introduce, support and maintain a variety of informatics tools for laboratory instruments, commercial software, and cloud infrastructure to facilitate scientific research.
  • Perform data-centric business analysis and provide pragmatic solutions.
  • Execute and automate standard scientific and statistical analyses.
  • Other duties, as assigned.

Requirements + Qualifications

  • Degree in a relevant scientific or computational field (chemistry, biology, computer science, bio/cheminformatics)
  • 3+ years work experience in a scientific or software/technology role
  • Direct work experience in scientific software administration, automation, or tool development, for example compound registration, assay results management systems, laboratory information management systems (LIMS), and desktop scientific tools
  • An understanding of drug discovery or biotherapeutic development and associated scientific principles and processes
  • Attention to detail, an ability to manage small scale projects, and the perseverance to follow projects to completion.
  • Preferred experience:
  • chemical and biological data and protocols (screening assays, HPLC, LC/MS, binding, CD, etc.) and automation
  • scientifically relevant coding language
  • cloud infrastructure and dev-ops principles
  • A demonstrated ability to think logically and critically
  • Outstanding organizational, interpersonal, written and oral communication skills are critical.
  • Experience working in a fast-paced, startup / small company corporate environment is a plus.

Job Responsibilities:
The Data Analyst purpose is to ‘turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions.'
  • Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports
  • Interpreting data, analyzing results using statistical techniques
  • Developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality
  • Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain data systems
  • Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
  • Undertaking data collection, preprocessing (structured and unstructured data), data-filtering, data-cleansing and analysis
  • Analyze large amounts of raw information to discover trends and find patterns
  • Work with business stakeholders to prioritize business decision and information needs using Analytics
  • Building models to address business problems using predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
  • Presenting information using data visualization techniques
  • Collaborate with business teams to use data to identify and resolve issues causing operational inefficiency and ineffectiveness
  • Use data to locate and define new business process improvement opportunities
Job Requirements:
  • Degree in Mathematics, Information Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics or other relevant streams
  • Min 1-3 years of relevant working experience
  • Knowledge of R, SQL and Python; familiarity with Scala, Java or C++
  • Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Power BI) and data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop)
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
  • Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets
  • Knowledge of using Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence tools on AWS, Azure or Google would be beneficial
  • Strong mathematical skills (e.g. statistics, algebra)
  • Strong aptitude to learn and become adept in new programming languages

Interested candidates, who wish to apply for the advertised position, please email us an updated copy of your resume. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column3: EM2Ai Pte Ltd is a IT solution start-up company specializing in artificial intelligence and healthcare software for dental industry. column1:

Get To Know Our Team:

We are a Dynamic team with a mission to inspire ethical healthcare through providing comprehensive dental healthcare services in Asia Pacific, equipping everyman with treatment knowledge plan through the use of technology.

You will play an important role in:

  • Cybersecurity first responders
  • Respond to threat
  • Recover from breaches
  • Threat intelligence, threats monitoring and detect threats
  • Endpoint & Network Security
  • Network vulnerability assessment and reporting
  • Source Code Scanning, Automated Penetration Testing, Manual Penetration Testing
  • Secure data
  • Security operations (Data security, Infrastructure security)
  • User's Identity and keys management

To be successful in this role, you will need to have:

  • Diploma in Data Protection or Diploma in Infocomm & Digital Media (Cyber Security)
  • At least 2 years of experience in IT, Technology / software development. Exposure into Information Security domains with CISSP or equivalent certifications
  • Passionate about security, enjoy challenges and maintain up-to-date knowledge of available and emerging security threats and various security technologies
  • Use of advanced data analysis tools to determine security trends and threat patterns for key stakeholders to make informed decisions
  • Liaise with stakeholders in relation to cyber security issues, provide updates on recent trends based on the outputs of data analysis
  • Drive the improvement of data quality and efficiency of data generation and collection systems
  • Good skills in at least one or more scripting languages; Perl, Python, Go, or Shell
  • Knowledge of information security standards like ISO 27001, OWASP
  • Good interpersonal skills with the ability to communicate and work effectively across the organization

Get to know EM2Ai

EM2Ai Sdn Bhd is an IT solution firm backed by SGX Listed Company with a vision to promote ethical medical practices through the evolution of AI Machine Learning. We specialize in artificial intelligence and healthcare software for the dental industry. Our ultimate aim is to improve patients’ health and health administration through intelligent, advanced and cost-effective technologies.

We aspire to expand in Southeast Asia and look for like-minded individuals to join us in expanding this vision.

column4: DFI Retail Group (“Group”) is a leading pan-Asian retailer. At 30th June 2021, the Group and its associates and joint ventures operated over 10,000 outlets and employed some 230,000 team members. The Group had total annual sales in 2020 exceeding US$28 billion.

The Group provides quality and value to Asian consumers by offering leading brands, a compelling retail experience and great service; all delivered through a strong store network supported by efficient supply chains.
The Group (including associates and joint ventures) operates under a number of well-known brands across food, health and beauty, home furnishings, restaurants and other retailing.

The Group’s parent company, Dairy Farm International Holdings Limited, is incorporated in Bermuda and has a standard listing on the London Stock Exchange, with secondary listings in Bermuda and Singapore. The Group's businesses are managed from Hong Kong by Dairy Farm Management Services Limited through its regional offices.
DFI Retail Group is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group

column1:
","

About Us

DFI Retail Group (“Group”) is a leading pan-Asian retailer. At 30th June 2021, the Group and its associates and joint ventures operated over 10,000 outlets and employed some 230,000 team members. The Group had total annual sales in 2020 exceeding US$28 billion. The Group provides quality and value to Asian consumers by offering leading brands, a compelling retail experience and great service; all delivered through a strong store network supported by efficient supply chains.  The Group (including associates and joint ventures) operates under a number of well-known brands across food, health and beauty, home furnishings, restaurants and other retailing.

DFI Retail Group is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group.

The Role

To support HR Shared Services Center by accurately manage and maintain complex team member information transactional requests while adhering to HR Shared Service Center processing standards and service level commitments and provide recommendations for process improvement.

To provide HR analytical expertise and identify any issues related to operational matters for HR Shared Services Center, determine root cause and proactively promote and lead efforts to guarantee continuous process improvement.

  • Responsible timely, data accuracy and integrity in handling team member records in HRIS throughout Employee Life Cycle events
  • Data entry may include but is not limited to, team member status changes, transfer, terminations, new hires, reorganizations, and use of correction mode as needed.
  • Ensure data submitted for processing is in alignment with company policies and practices prior to processing.
  • Streamline and improve upon the process for data entry, through effective use of data entry forms that are consistent, in compliance and ensuring payroll timelines are met effectively.
  • Perform regular audits and reconciliation to ensure consistency and relevance of the HR data maintained.
  • Take ownership of analyzing the data thoroughly and provides detailed reports to the Management for putting the necessary checks in place.
  • Manage HR stakeholders on Data Management initiatives
  • Ensure service level and turnaround time are conformed to at all times
  • Responsible for reviewing work processes and system with a view on enhancements and process improvements
  • Involve and participate in HR projects and key business initiatives as required.
  • Any other duties as assigned. 

About You

  • Bachelor’s degree in HR or equivalent
  • At least 3-5 years’ relevant experience in HR
  • Work experience in an HR Shared Services environment is a must
  • Team player, energetic, service-oriented and able to work in a dynamic and fast paced environment
  • Able to multi task, work well under pressure and deliver within tight timeline
  • Excellent analytical skills with proven experience in business analysis and interpretation, clearly communicating findings and recommendations to meet the requirements.
  • Demonstrates excellent communication and good presentation skills
  • Detail-oriented and ability to creatively seek viable solutions to complex situations 
  • Ability to partner and collaborate with the relevant HR functions to achieve business goals
  • Proficient in MS Office especially Excel

Benefits

  • Team Member Discount
  • Subsidized Medical and Dental Benefits
  • Training Opportunities
  • Career Advancement

Working Location: Tampines

Follow us on Telegram: DFI Retail Group SG Careers!

column2: DBS is a leading financial services group in Asia, with over 280 branches across 18 markets. Headquartered and listed in Singapore, DBS has a growing presence in the three key Asian axes of growth: Greater China, Southeast Asia and South Asia. The bank's ""AA-"" and ""Aa1"" credit ratings are among the highest in the world.

column3: DBS is at the forefront of leveraging digital technology to shape the future of banking, and has been named “World’s Best Digital Bank” by Euromoney in 2016 and 2018. The bank has also been recognised for its leadership in the region, having been named “Asia’s Best Bank” by several publications including The Banker, Global Finance, IFR Asia and Euromoney since 2012. In addition, the bank has been named “Safest Bank in Asia” by Global Finance for nine consecutive years from 2009 to 2017.

DBS provides a full range of services in consumer, SME and corporate banking. As a bank born and bred in Asia, DBS understands the intricacies of doing business in the region’s most dynamic markets. DBS is committed to building lasting relationships with customers, and positively impacting communities through supporting social enterprises, as it banks the Asian way. It has also established a SGD 50 million foundation to strengthen its corporate social responsibility efforts in Singapore and across Asia.

With its extensive network of operations in Asia and emphasis on engaging and empowering its staff, DBS presents exciting career opportunities. The bank acknowledges the passion, commitment and can-do spirit in all of its 26,000 staff, representing over 40 nationalities.

column1:
